com.karuslabs.commons.menu

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karuslabs.commons.menu.regions.Region
      • com.karuslabs.commons.menu.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder

    public class Menu
extends Region
    Represents an in-game menu which may contain regions.

    • Field Summary

      • within

        public boolean within(int slot)
        Determines if the slot specified is within the menu.
        Specified by:
        within in class Region
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot
        Returns:
        true, if the slot is not negative and is less than the backing inventory size; else false
